name: Pirate Ship (rvenson)
description:
This is a game demo of ship fighting. I made this for a workshop about game design / godot engine.

Controls

A, W, S, D and Arrow Keys - Ship movement
Space - Fire
Shift + Space - Bullet Time Fire
Mouse: Start and restart game
